com.github.zhengframework.configuration.source

接口 ConfigurationSource

  • 所有已知实现类:
    AbstractConfigurationSource, CachedConfigurationSource, EmptyConfigurationSource, EnvironmentVariablesConfigurationSource, FallbackConfigurationSource, FileConfigurationSource, InMemoryConfigurationSource, JDBCConfigurationSource, MergeConfigurationSource, MeteredConfigurationSource, SystemPropertiesConfigurationSource

    public interface ConfigurationSource

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void addListener(ConfigurationSourceListener listener) 
      Map<String,String> getConfiguration(Environment environment)
      Get configuration
      void init() 
      void removeListener(ConfigurationSourceListener listener) 

    • 方法详细资料

      • init

        void init()
        抛出:
        ConfigurationSourceException - fetch fail
        IllegalStateException - when source was improperly configured

      • addListener

        void addListener(ConfigurationSourceListener listener)

      • removeListener

        void removeListener(ConfigurationSourceListener listener)

      • getConfiguration

        Map<String,String> getConfiguration(Environment environment)
        Get configuration
        参数:
        environment - environment to use
        返回:
        configuration set for environment
        抛出:
        MissingEnvironmentException - when requested environment couldn't be found
        IllegalStateException - when unable to fetch configuration
